titleStmt.title: The reading of that famous and learned genrleman, Robert Callis ... upon the statute of 23 H.8, Cap. 5, of Sewers, as it was delivered by him at Grays-Inn in August, 1622.
titleStmt.author: Callis, Robert, fl. 1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Leak and are to be sold at his shop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
